### Exercise 1


### Exercise 2

```{r}
dn_ak$establishment <- "dn"
lq_ak$establishment <- "lq"

dn_lq_ak <- 
  full_join(dn_ak, lq_ak, by = join_by(address, city, state, zip, longitude, latitude, establishment))
```
